ygData.subject: Advice
ygData.msgSnippet: Hello all, I`ve just started a new wizard, after decided that my old character wasnt fulfilling enough for me...I am a DarkElf on the E`Ci server, at level 3
ygData.messageBody:
Hello all, I`ve just started a new wizard, after decided that my old
character wasnt fulfilling enough for me...I am a DarkElf on the E`Ci server,
at level 3 right now....any advice for me through the ranks? Not just for
the low levels, but also for higher levels regarding wizards....Any
strategies youve learned to be useful? Any particular targets for particular
levels? Tips and Tricks? Thanks in advance for any help you can give!

Tim Thorn
AKA Justarius Level 3 Wizard
